TopicTitle: Unremovable rescue pod -- New rescue pod not appearing

Articles.Content:
I have a pod leftover from a rescue mission, but it seems that I cannot remove it. I've deleted it in the tracking station and it disappears but when I return to the vessel that had been tracking it, it comes back. The pod for a new rescue contract is also not appearing.

![CaRL0yh.png](http://imgur.com/CaRL0yh.png)
